description:
This course aims at presenting the fundamentations and
important computational algorithms that are very related to
important applications in visual information processing and
analysis: from image acquisition to processing, and to
interpretation/understanding. The emphasis is on the tight
integration of mathematical foundations, numerical
algorithms, and programming implementation techniques
related to industrial applications.

Major topics include: fundamentals for pictorial data
acquisition and processing, Computational method for 3D
reconstruction, Visual data categorization and
segmentation, computational methods for visual learning
and their applications in pattern analysis.
title: Visual Data Processing and Interpretation
